description: Try our easy to follow Flexi Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Flexi Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs no added salt tomato paste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mince, mushroom, carrot, tomato paste, parsley and garlic together in a bowl. Knead together well with clean hands. Divide into 6 portions and shape into thick patties.
Heat a barbecue plate on medium heat. Cook onion for 10 minutes, turning frequently, or until browned. Transfer to a plate.
At the same time, cook patties for 8 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Place a cheese slice on each patty. Transfer to a plate.

Meanwhile, toast bread rolls, if desired. Place bases on serving plates, and top with lettuce, 2 slices each of tomato and beetroot, onion, burger patty and sauce or relish. Top with lids and serve immediately.
